name: YATT (You are the tower)
description:
This is our submission for the Kenney Jam 2017, where we had to make a game in 2 days using Kenney's assets. The theme was "It's a feature, not a bug!".

This is a tower defense where you are also a tower. Be careful not to shoot your other towers !

Made with Godot Engine 2.1, by 1e0 and cocosar07.

Mac version untested /!\

HTML version may not be optimized...
